sentences.en: “one of the many theories that keep cropping up in his story”(&b{Christopher Lehmann-Haupt})
sentences.cn: “一个在他的故事中不断意外出现的理论”(&b{克里斯托夫·莱曼——豪普特})

sentences.en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentences.cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃.

sentences.en: Cranberries have become a major cash crop.
sentences.cn: 越橘已经成了主要经济作物。

sentences.en: crops grown for market
sentences.cn: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.en: Fruit growers are gathering in a bumper crop (= a very large amount of something produced in season ) .
sentences.cn: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

sentences.en: I decided to crop the picture just above the water line.
sentences.cn: 我决定把这张照片水印以下的部分裁掉。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: It might be possible to extend the technique to other crop plants.
sentences.cn: 也许可以将这种技术应用于其他农作物。

sentences.en: Last year 400,000 acres of land yielded a crop worth $1.75 billion.
sentences.cn: 去年40万英亩的土地产值达17.5亿美元。

sentences.en: Last year's cotton crop was an unmitigated disaster.
sentences.cn: 去年棉花作物所遭遇的是彻头彻尾的灾难。

sentences.en: Polluted water lessens crop yields.
sentences.cn: 受污染的水源会降低农作物产量。

sentences.en: Problems will crop up and hit you before you are ready.
sentences.cn: 你还未准备好，问题就会突然出现并打击你。

sentences.en: She asked the barber to crop her hair short.
sentences.cn: 她叫理发师把她的头发剪短了.

sentences.en: She had her long hair cut into a boyish crop.
sentences.cn: 她把长发剪成了男孩子般的短发。

sentences.en: Stella’s had her hair closely cropped .
sentences.cn: 斯特拉把头发剪得很短。

sentences.en: Sugar is an important crop on the island.
sentences.cn: 糖料作物是这个岛上的一种重要作物。

sentences.en: The amount of rainfall determines the quality of the crop.
sentences.cn: 降雨量决定着收成的好坏.

sentences.en: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.
sentences.cn: 天气变得更加温和，粮食产量也已经提高。

sentences.en: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.cn: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.en: The staple crop is rice.
sentences.cn: 主要农作物为水稻。

words.tran_cn: 种植者；农作物；收割机；修剪机

phrases.tran_cn: n. 麦田里的怪圈（指在麦田里发现的没有麦子的奇怪圆环，目前尚没有科学的解释）
粮食产量，作物产量；谷物收获量
粮食作物，蔬菜作物；食用罪
主要农作物；主林木；主伐林木
现存量；林木；未收割的作物

trans.tran_cn: 庄稼，作物，收成，一群，一些，短发
trans.tran_en: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

trans.tran_cn: 有收成，收割，啃吃（草等），剪短，剪裁
